Posts.Content: VAL1966 wrote: Hi, i'm new at this! am very worried, found a lump about 7 weeks ago, saw a doctor, had an ultrasound, then a mammogram, within 4 hours of my mammogram, i received a call, stating that a specialist was going to be here on April 5th and wanted to see me! she scheduled blood work, another mammogram and an mri, then i saw her, she performed a core biopsy, she was very agressive and said you will need surgery! and i asked as i was crying, what kind of surgery- she said for sure a lumpectomy! she said she couldn't answer any more questions, but had a to see a surgeon immediately - i was walked down to the surgeon's office, left there and his secretary told me whatever you were told, the dr. will not perform anything until your results from your biopsy come back! so i'm schedule to see the surgeon on April 15th and he's hoping the results will be back by then. I am very worried.. what does everyone think! do i have breast cancer??? Dx 4/5/2013, IDC, 2cm, Grade 3, 7/19 nodes, ER+/PR-, HER2- Surgery 4/19/2013 Lymph node removal: Right, Underarm/Axillary; Mastectomy: Right Radiation Therapy 10/15/2013 Breast Chemotherapy Cytoxan (cyclophosphamide), Ellence (epirubicin), Fluorouracil (5-fluorouracil, 5-FU, Adrucil), Taxotere (docetaxel) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Extremely worried! No answers VAL1966 VAL1966

Posts.Content: Apr 9, 2013 11:37AM VAL1966 wrote: thanks everyone for your encouraging words and support! I will keep you all posted
